mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_lock userLock FROM sys_eve_user a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.user_code userCode, a.pwd_num_enc pwdNum, a.`password`, a.user_lock userLock, b.win_bg_pic_url winBgPicUrl, b.win_lock_bg_pic_url winLockBgPicUrl, b.win_theme_color winThemeColor, b.win_start_menu_size winStartMenuSize, b.win_task_position winTaskPosition, b.win_bg_pic_vague winBgPicVague, b.win_bg_pic_vague_value winBgPicVagueValue, b.win_bottom_menu_icon loadBottomMenuIcon, c.id staffId, c.job_number jobNumber, c.user_name userName, c.user_photo userPhoto, c.company_id companyId, u.company_name companyName, c.department_id departmentId, q.department_name departmentName, c.job_id jobId, p.job_name jobName FROM sys_eve_user a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_install b ON a.id = b.user_id, sys_eve_user_staff c, company_job p, company_department q, company_mation u WHERE a.user_code = #{userCode} AND a.id = c.user_id AND c.company_id = u.id AND c.department_id = q.id AND c.job_id = p.id
SELECT a.id, a.role_name roleName, a.role_desc roleDesc FROM sys_eve_role a
SELECT IFNULL(a.role_id, "") roleIds FROM sys_eve_user a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT c.id, c.menu_name `name`, c.menu_name_en menuNameEn, c.menu_icon icon, c.menu_url pageURL, c.open_type openType, c.menu_type menuType, '-1' maxOpen, 'false' extend, null childs, IFNULL(e.parent_id, c.menu_parent_id) parentId, IFNULL(e.menu_level, c.menu_level) menuLevel, c.menu_icon_color menuIconColor, c.menu_icon_bg menuIconBg, c.menu_icon_pic menuIconPic, c.menu_icon_type menuIconType, IFNULL(c.desktop_id, '') deskTopId FROM sys_eve_user a, sys_eve_role_menu b, sys_eve_menu c LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_custom_parent e ON e.menu_id = c.id AND e.create_id = #{id}, sys_eve_win_num d, sys_eve_win_super_power f, sys_eve_win g WHERE a.id = #{id} AND INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.role_id, ','), CONCAT(',', b.role_id, ',')) AND b.menu_id = c.id AND c.menu_sys_type = '1' AND c.id NOT IN(SELECT d.menu_id FROM sys_eve_user_custom_menu_del d WHERE d.create_id = #{id}) AND d.id = f.win_num_id AND f.win_id = g.id AND g.id = c.sys_win_id GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.order_num ASC) a UNION SELECT a.id, a.menu_name `name`, a.menu_name_en menuNameEn, a.menu_icon icon, a.menu_url pageURL, a.open_type openType, a.menu_type menuType, '-1' maxOpen, 'false' extend, null childs, IFNULL(e.parent_id, a.menu_parent_id) parentId, IFNULL(e.menu_level, 1) menuLevel, a.menu_icon_color menuIconColor, a.menu_icon_bg menuIconBg, a.menu_icon_pic menuIconPic, a.menu_icon_type menuIconType, IFNULL(a.desktop_id, '') deskTopId FROM sys_eve_user_custom_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_custom_parent e ON e.menu_id = a.id AND e.create_id = #{id} WHERE a.create_id = #{id} UNION SELECT a.id, a.menu_box_name `name`, a.menu_box_name menuNameEn, '' icon, '--' pageURL, 2 openType, '' menuType, '-1' maxOpen, 'false' extend, null childs, '0' parentId, 0 menuLevel, '' menuIconColor, '' menuIconBg, '' menuIconPic, '' menuIconType, IFNULL(a.desktop_id, '') deskTopId FROM sys_eve_user_custom_menubox a WHERE a.create_id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.menu_name `name`, c.menu_name_en menuNameEn, c.menu_icon icon, c.menu_url pageURL, c.open_type openType, c.menu_type menuType, '-1' maxOpen, 'false' extend, null childs, c.menu_parent_id parentId, c.menu_level menuLevel, c.menu_icon_color menuIconColor, c.menu_icon_bg menuIconBg, c.menu_icon_pic menuIconPic, c.menu_icon_type menuIconType, IFNULL(c.desktop_id, '') deskTopId FROM sys_eve_user a, sys_eve_role_menu b, sys_eve_menu c, sys_eve_win_num d, sys_eve_win_super_power f, sys_eve_win g WHERE a.id = #{id} AND INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.role_id, ','), CONCAT(',', b.role_id, ',')) AND b.menu_id = c.id AND d.id = f.win_num_id AND f.win_id = g.id AND g.id = c.sys_win_id GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.order_num ASC
SELECT a.id, a.user_code userCode FROM sys_eve_user a WHERE a.user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT into sys_eve_user (id, user_code, pwd_num_enc, password, user_lock, creater, create_time, is_term_of_validity) VALUES (#{id}, #{userCode}, #{pwdNum}, #{password}, #{userLock}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{isTermOfValidity})

INSERT into sys_eve_user_install (id, user_id, win_bg_pic_url, win_lock_bg_pic_url, win_theme_color, win_start_menu_size, win_task_position, create_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{winBgPicUrl}, #{winLockBgPicUrl}, #{winThemeColor}, #{winStartMenuSize}, #{winTaskPosition}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.menu_num menuNum, a.auth_menu menuUrl FROM sys_eve_menu_auth_point a, sys_eve_role_menu b, sys_eve_user c WHERE b.menu_id = a.id AND INSTR(CONCAT(',', c.role_id, ','), CONCAT(',', b.role_id, ',')) AND c.id = #{id} GROUP BY a.menu_num

SELECT a.job_number jobNumber, a.user_name userName, a.user_photo userPhoto, a.user_idcard userIdCard, a.user_sex userSex, a.email userEmail, a.phone userPhone, a.home_phone userHomePhone, a.qq userQq, a.user_sign userSign, m.company_name companyName, m.department_name departmentName, m.job_name jobName, b.user_code userCode FROM sys_eve_user_staff a LEFT JOIN (SELECT o.user_id, p.job_name, q.department_name, u.company_name FROM sys_eve_user_staff o, company_job p, company_department q, company_mation u WHERE o.company_id = u.id AND o.department_id = q.id AND o.job_id = p.id) m ON m.user_id = a.user_id, sys_eve_user b WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND b.id = a.user_id

SELECT d.id, CASE #{language} WHEN 'zh' THEN d.desktop_name WHEN 'cn' THEN d.desktop_name_cn ELSE '' END `name` FROM sys_eve_user a, sys_eve_role_menu b, sys_eve_desktop d WHERE a.id = #{id} AND INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.role_id, ','), CONCAT(',', b.role_id, ',')) AND b.menu_id = d.id AND d.state = '2' GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.order_by DESC
